allow: Bash(python -c "import json; data = json.load(open(''蔚蓝档案-铁道双子篇.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'')); content = data[''content'']; lines = content.split(''\n''); start = [i for i, l in enumerate(lines) if ''setupGameEvents'' in l or ''function.*Action'' in l or ''gsap'' in l]; print(''\n''.join([str(i) + '': '' + lines[i] for i in start[:20]]))")

Bash(python -c "import json; data = json.load(open(''蔚蓝档案-铁道双子篇.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'')); content = data[''content'']; lines = content.split(''\n''); start = [i for i, l in enumerate(lines) if ''function executeAction'' in l or ''async function executeAction'' in l]; print(''Found at lines:'', start); print(''\n''.join([f''{i}: {lines[i]}'' for i in range(start[0] if start else 1000, min((start[0] if start else 1000) + 150, len(lines)))]))")

Bash(python -c "import json; data = json.load(open(''蔚蓝档案-铁道双子篇.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'')); content = data[''content'']; lines = content.split(''\n''); start = [i for i, l in enumerate(lines) if ''@keyframes shake'' in l or ''shake-light'' in l]; print(''Found shake keyframes at lines:'', start[:10]); print(''\n''.join([f''{i}: {lines[i]}'' for i in range(start[0] if start else 500, min((start[0] if start else 500) + 50, len(lines)))]))")
